rules.natural: Provided that an expert consultation meeting has been held, then if a research study has been published, either conservation funding has been approved for the project or whenever a wildlife survey has been conducted, the eagle is a protected species or the tiger is a protected species.
Under the condition that the program has received government support, the program has achieved conservation success.
If illegal trading has been detected in the market, then enforcement action has been taken in the raid.
Whenever illegal trading has been detected in the market, it is not the case that enforcement action has been taken in the raid.
Provided that community outreach has been successful in the village, public awareness has increased due to the campaign.
Either community outreach has been successful in the village or the educational program has been effective in the school.
Under the condition that the educational program has been effective in the school, the program has achieved conservation success.
If media coverage of the news has been positive, then provided that public awareness has increased due to the campaign, the program has achieved conservation success.
Provided that the social media post has gone viral, then if public awareness has increased due to the campaign, the program has achieved conservation success.
Under the condition that the eagle is a protected species, it is not the case that John has been arrested for poaching.
If a journalist has interviewed an expert, media coverage of the news has been positive.
Provided that an influencer has participated in the event, the social media post has gone viral.
Provided that peer review has been completed for the paper, the program has received government support.
Whenever the tiger is a protected species, it is not the case that John has been arrested for poaching.
If legislative approval has been gained for the bill, policy changes have been implemented through the reform.
Either legislative approval has been gained for the bill or an executive order has been issued as a directive.

Provided that an executive order has been issued as a directive, then if it is not the case that whenever scientific evidence has been presented with the data, peer review has been completed for the paper, then the methodology of the study has been questioned.
If the court ruling has been favorable in the decision, then whenever a legal challenge has been filed in the lawsuit, a public protest has occurred during the demonstration.
Either the court ruling has been favorable in the decision or the appeal process has been initiated in the case.

Under the condition that a settlement has been reached in the agreement, then whenever the appeal process has been initiated in the case, then if a legal challenge has been filed in the lawsuit, a public protest has occurred during the demonstration.

If mediation has been successful in the negotiation, then provided that the appeal process has been initiated in the case, then if a legal challenge has been filed in the lawsuit, a public protest has occurred during the demonstration.
Either stakeholder consensus has been achieved in the meeting or a compromise has been proposed in the plan.
Provided that a compromise has been proposed in the plan, mediation has been successful in the negotiation.
If deforestation has occurred in the region, the forest habitat has been destroyed.
Either deforestation has occurred in the region or a wildlife survey has been conducted.
Whenever a wildlife survey has been conducted, a population decline has been found for the species.
Either a research study has been published or the field team has submitted a report.

If the field team has submitted a report, then either conservation funding has been approved for the project or under the condition that a wildlife survey has been conducted, either the eagle is a protected species or the tiger is a protected species.

Under the condition that it is not the case that either private funding has been secured for the initiative or the program has received government support, illegal trading has been detected in the market.
If it is not the case that either media coverage of the news has been positive or the social media post has gone viral, a legal challenge has been filed in the lawsuit.

Whenever it is not the case that either media coverage of the news has been positive or the social media post has gone viral, it is not the case that a public protest has occurred during the demonstration.
Under the condition that it is not the case that either a journalist has interviewed an expert or an influencer has participated in the event, controversy has arisen from the incident.
Provided that it is not the case that either a journalist has interviewed an expert or an influencer has participated in the event, it is not the case that controversy has arisen from the incident.

If it is not the case that whenever a population decline has been found for the species, either the eagle is a protected species or the tiger is a protected species, emergency measures have been activated under the protocol.

Provided that it is not the case that either international cooperation has been established via the treaty or, if it is not the case that whenever a population decline has been found for the species, either the eagle is a protected species or the tiger is a protected species, then emergency measures have not been activated under the protocol, diplomatic issues have occurred in the dispute.

If it is not the case that either international cooperation has been established via the treaty or, under the condition that it is not the case that whenever a population decline has been found for the species, either the eagle is a protected species or the tiger is a protected species, then emergency measures have not been activated under the protocol, it is not the case that diplomatic issues have occurred in the dispute.

Provided that it is not the case that whenever scientific evidence has been presented with the data, peer review has been completed for the paper, it is not the case that the methodology of the study has been questioned.

Under the condition that it is not the case that whenever stakeholder consensus has been achieved in the meeting, a settlement has been reached in the agreement, negotiation has failed in the discussion.
If the program has not achieved conservation success, John has been arrested for poaching.
